title: Weirdly specific problems with Camera app?
content:
Right now, my front-facing camera does not even open (i.e. it plays the animation to "flip" to the front camera, but it just pauses for a while and goes back to the back-facing camera). Also, trying to click on Playground mode instantly crashes the Camera app.
Back when I first got the phone, the front-facing camera was fine. After a day or two, it wouldn't flip anymore.
Also, when I first downloaded Android 10, the front-facing camera worked again. But then it stopped working again.
The problems still occur after safe mode.
What should I do?
